entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
